Name: CymbalsStep
Notes: A set of cymbal platforms with separate collision meshes. The top one can be moved like a seesaw platform. A SW_A can be activated by Ground Pounding the top. It also supports BCK, BTK, BTP, BRK and BVA animations. Animations must have the same name as the model in order to be played. The animations will start playing once the object loads. Also supports color change (ColorChange.brk) and texture change (TexChange.btk/.btp) animations as well as shadows (Shadow.bcsv).

Obj_arg0.Name: Color Frame
Obj_arg0.Description: If ColorChange.brk exists, this will define the color frame to be used.

Obj_arg1.Name: Texture Frame
Obj_arg1.Description: If TexChange.btp/.btk exists, this will define the texture frame to be used.

Obj_arg2.Name: Shadow Length
Obj_arg2.Description: If Shadow.bcsv exists, this defines the shadow's drop length.

RotateSpeed.Name: Rotation Speed
RotateSpeed.Description: How fast it rotates. Default is 0. Only used if RotateAxis is 0.

RotateAngle.Name: Rotation Angle
RotateAngle.Description: How many angles in degrees the platform rotates. Default is 0.

RotateAxis.Name: Rotation Type
RotateAxis.Description: How the platform moves when stepped on. Default corresponds to 1.

Values.Notes: Rotate around Z axis, returns to original rotation
Rotate XZ plane, returns to original rotation

RotateAccelType.Name: Inertia Factor / Acceleration
RotateAccelType.Description: Affects how long it will remain in motion. If RotateAxis is 0 or 1, it also affects how fast rotation will speed up. Default is 0.

RotateStopTime.Name: Restore Force
RotateStopTime.Description: The force used to restore its original rotation after getting of the platform. Only used if RotateAxis is 0 or 1.

SW_APPEAR.Description: The object will appear when this switch is activated.

SW_DEAD.Description: Can be activated when the object is killed through a cutscene action.

SW_A.Description: Gets activated after Ground Pounding the top.

SW_AWAKE.Description: Enables rendering and resumes updates when this switch is active.

DemoCast.Description: The object takes part in the cutscene.
